name: pm2.8
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), w0))
-| wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w1))
|- wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w0, w2)))

comment: Theorem *2.8 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 108. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-2005.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 5-Jan-2013.)
